title: Watch Ciryl Gane score the latest heavyweight submission ever at UFC on ESPN+ 20
text:
Gallery Ciryl Gane def. Don’Tale Mayes at UFC on ESPN+ 20: Best photos view 10 images

Not just a striker, Ciryl Gane now has more submissions than knockouts on his resume.

Gane (5-0 MMA, 2-0 UFC), a kickboxer, notched another one Saturday in ever so impressive fashion, tapping out Don’Tale Mayes at UFC on ESPN+ 20 via heel hook with only 14 seconds left in the fight, the latest submission win in UFC heavyweight history.

Check it out here (via Twitter):

Training out of MMA Factory in Paris, alongside heavyweight contender Francis Ngannou, Gane has aspirations of headlining a show in his home country of France. And with the sport getting legalized effective January 2020, he could see that come to fruition.

Either way, we’ve got a new heavyweight contender on the block.

The Blue Corner is MMA Junkie’s blog space. We don’t take it overly serious, and neither should you. If you come complaining to us that something you read here is not hard-hitting news, expect to have the previous sentence repeated in ALL CAPS.
description: Ciryl Gane scores the latest submission in UFC heavyweight history with a beautiful heel hook.
